QuestData.Title: Purity From Corruption
QuestData.Description: The flowers you brought me were the essential ingredient.$B$BProtective barriers surround Shadow Hold, projected from demonic braziers. If we are to drive the Shadow Council from Felwood, then those braziers must be extinguished.$B$BThis vial has been infused with crying violet and the magic of the wilds. Fill it at the corrupted moonwell in the center of Jaedenar and return to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fill the Empty Canteen with water from the corrupted moonwell in the center of Jaedenar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the waters from the corrupted moonwell?
